product_name: GSI Outdoors Titanium Kung Foon and Chopsticks Set
long_description: The GSI Outdoors Titanium Kung Foon and Chopsticks Set gives you lots of options for eating your camp meal. Use the foon and chopsticks together as a long utensil or use them separately. Slide the wooden chopsticks into the titanium foon handle to create a long-handled utensil perfect for scooping, scraping or stirring rehydrated pouch meals. When separated, the foon and chopsticks maintain their individual functionality. Barbed tines on the foon bite into food. Deep foon bowl works well when you're eating soups and cereals. GSI Outdoors Titanium Kung Foon and Chopsticks Set weighs 4.1 oz.
short_description: The GSI Outdoors Titanium Kung Foon and Chopsticks Set gives you lots of options for eating your camp meal. Use the foon and chopsticks together as a long utensil or use them separately.
